text:
Lots of reports today that seem to add up to US & @pfizer #COVID19 #vaccine :
- company offered US priority purchasing in July: #Trump admin declined
- U.S. to get enough for 50M ppl -- but most vax not until late spring 2021
- Same deal w/ @moderna_tx vax, so by mid-'21...
